general.pressContinue: Press Continue when you've done it

aside.logsSuccess: We've created a Zip file with all your logs
aside.logsError: There was an issue getting your logs, please collect them manually from the emudeck folder in your user folder.

ManageEmulatorsPage.title: Manage your Emulators
ManageEmulatorsPage.description: On this page, you can update your configurations or install new emulators. An orange notification means you have a configuration update ready for the respective emulator.

updateConfigs.title: Update all Configurations
updateConfigs.description: Update all of your configurations at once. New configurations might contain bug fixes or performance improvements. This will overwrite any global emulator settings you have changed. Per game settings will be retained

updateEmus.title: Update your Emulators
updateEmus.description: Update your emulators right from EmuDeck

QuickSettingsPage.title: Configure your Settings
QuickSettingsPage.nofifBoot: BootMode updated, please restart your device!

AndroidEmulatorSelectorPage.title: Emulators and tools for Android
AndroidEmulatorSelectorPage.description: These are the emulators EmuDeck installs to your system. Selected emulators will be installed and updated to the latest version. De-selected emulators will not be installed or updated.

AndroidFinishPage.title: EmuDeck Android Installed!
AndroidFinishPage.description:
If everything went well, you should see your Frontend on your Android device.
If you don't, please reinstall EmuDeck.

AndroidFrontendSelectorPage.title: Frontends for Android
AndroidFrontendSelectorPage.description: Select which frontends you would like to use to launch your games. You may select more than one.

AndroidOwnAPKPage.title: Bring your own APK
AndroidOwnAPKPage.description:
Do you have another emulator or do you want to install ESDE?
Put all your APK in your downloads folder and EmuDeck will install them
Please don't use pirated APKs

AndroidRomStoragePage.title: Select the ROM Storage for your Android Device

warning.title: Make sure your Android device is:
warning.line1: - Connected using a USB with data transfer capabilities
warning.line3: - You've accepted all the prompts in your device
warning.line4: - You've selected File Transfer when asked by the device

configs.yuzu: Go to your device, and click on Get Started and finish setup on your device. Your Keys should be in {{storage}}/Emulation/bios/yuzu/keys.
configs.ppsspp: Go to your device and create the PSP folder in {{storage}}/Emulation/saves/. Press Continue when you've done it.
configs.nethersx2: Go to your device and setup your bios. Your bios should be in {storage}/Emulation/bios/
configs.ra1: Go to your device, go to Load Core, Download Core and installall the cores you need.
configs.ra2: Each core is used for a different systems, these are the ones needed for the most common systems:
configs.ra3: mgba (GameBoy Advance), genesis_plus_gx(Genesis,MasterSystem), snex9x(Super Nintendo), melonds (Nintendo DS),mame2003_plus (MAME), mesen (NES), gambatte (GameBoy), mupen64plus_next(Nintendo 64), swanstation (Playstation 1)
configs.ra4: Then go to Settings, Directory. Set your System/Bios to {{storage}}/Emulation/bios. Set Save Files to {{storage}}/Emulation/saves/RetroArch/saves and Save States to {{storage}}/Emulation/saves/RetroArch/states

AndroidWelcomePage.description: This early access build allows you to install several emulators and configurations to your Android Device

quickInstall.title: Install to Android
quickInstall.description: Wizard that will install your Emulators, copy your current bios folder and guide you through the setup of your Android device

AspectRatio3DPage.title: Configure Aspect Ratio for Classic 3D Games

AspectRatioDolphinPage.title: Configure Aspect Ratio for GameCube games

AspectRatioSegaPage.title: Configure Aspect Ratio for Classic Sega Systems

AspectRatioSNESPage.title: Configure Aspect Ratio for Classic Nintendo

CheckUpdatePage.title: EmuDeck is loading...
CheckUpdatePage.backend: Building EmuDeck backend and running autodiagnostics in the background...

checking.title: Checking for updates...
checking.description: Please stand by while we check if there is a new version available...

updating.title: Updating!
updating.description: EmuDeck will restart as soon as it finishes the update. Hold on tight.

found.title: Update found!
found.description:
Do you want to update?
This update won't modify your games or settings
Please go to Manage Emulators to apply all the new configurations.

error.title: Ooopsie
error.description: There seems to be an issue downloading the backend. Please restart EmuDeck after testing your network is working

ConfirmationPage.title: Here is what EmuDeck will do

EarlyAccessPage.title: Help us by supporting EmuDeck
EarlyAccessPage.description: Donate on Patreon and help us grow and improve! As a member of our community you'll get 1 on 1 individual support and early access to our latest features, some of them exclusive for patrons only

eaTier.description: Get access to the latest features and apps before anyone, this includes exclusive support and new features for SteamOS, Windows, MacOS and Android in the future.
eaTier.list:
• - Early access
  • - General Support
  • - CloudSync ( Sync your saved games across Mac, Windows or Linux )
  • - Private Discord community

fanTier.description: You really really love what I do, and I thank you for that! This contribution will help EmuDeck buy new devices and set custom optimizations for others systems.
fanTier.list:
• - Same features as Early Access and
  • - Voting rights, let's shape the future of EmuDeck together

RomStoragePage.title: Select your ROM Directory
RomStoragePage.description: Your ROM directory will be squared away within an Emulation folder in your selected directory.
RomStoragePage.modalErrorDetecting: There was an error detecting your storage...
RomStoragePage.modalErrorWritable: There was an error detecting your storage...
RomStoragePage.modalError: There was an error, please restart EmuDeck...

Shaders2DPage.title: Configure CRT Shader for Classic 2D Games
Shaders2DPage.description: The CRT Shader gives your classic systems a faux retro CRT vibe.

Shaders3DPage.title: Configure CRT Shader for Classic 3D Games
Shaders3DPage.description: The CRT Shader gives your classic systems a faux retro CRT vibe.

ShadersHandheldsPage.title: Configure LCD Shader for Handheld Systems
ShadersHandheldsPage.description: The LCD Shader simulates the old LCD Matrix screens of handheld systems.

UninstallPage.title: Uninstall EmuDeck
UninstallPage.description: The EmuDeck Uninstallation utility should only be used if you are intending on removing EmuDeck from your system. If you are having issues, run a Custom Reset, troubleshoot the specific tool or emulator, or visit EmuDeck Discord or Reddit for additional support.

UpdateEmusPage.title: Update your Emulators & Tools
UpdateEmusPage.description: Emulators and tools can be installed a multitude of ways. EmuDeck installs some emulators and tools as Flatpaks from the Discover Store. Others are downloaded for you directly from the developer's website as AppImages or Binaries. A few are Windows Executables, downloaded and run through Proton.

WelcomePage.title: Welcome to EmuDeck for {{systemName}}
WelcomePage.description: Select how you want to set up your device

errorModal.title: Error detecting your Operating System
errorModal.description:
Click on the Close button to try again

If the issue persists, please contact us on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/b9F7GpXtFP

StoreFront.alertInstalled:
Game Installed.
Go back to EmulationStation to play it
StoreFront.alertError: There was an error installing the game

UpdateEmus.title: Select which batch you want to update:
UpdateEmus.btn2: Update AppImages, Binaries, and Windows Executables
